biotools.summary: Tool for assessing the accuracy of assembled haplotypes. Editting functions such as breaking erroneous haplotype segments into smaller segments or concatenating haplotype segments are also possible.

bioschemas.name: HapEdit
bioschemas.summary: Tool for assessing the accuracy of assembled haplotypes. Editting functions such as breaking erroneous haplotype segments into smaller segments or concatenating haplotype segments are also possible.
